title: The Drunkard's reformation
creator_credit: American Mutoscope and Biograph Company and D.W. Griffith
brief_description: An alcoholic father takes time to reflect when he, accompanied by his child, is confronted with a stage performance preaching the evils of drinking. Cast includes Arthur V. Johnson, Linda Arvidson, Adele DeGarde, Charles Avery, Florence Lawrence, Mack Sennett, Harry Solter. Silent film with English intertitles.
